body: This is my favorite depiction of Female Robin. Just too damn cute.

@WantToCry @OrewaRapeMan Ikr? So much vanilla in this... I could be puking it up for weeks. jk. But seriously Vanilla does need a tag of its own soon. People might argue "Oh but Vanilla is normal! Why should a normal common thing need a tag??" But they don't realize that Japan's R-18 fandom culture has started to shift away from the norm. I have heard from a Japanese acquaintance from Pixiv, and it's pretty apparent that they are more accepting of tentacles, rape, NTR, incest, pregnancy, futa, and so on eventually as the new norm. No longer are those things hardcore anymore. Hardcore is now almost reserved specifically for Ryona, Guro/gore, and the likes. Don't believe me? Check pixiv and their R-18 sections and rankings. It will tell you all you need to know.  As if the recent flow of doujins weren't transparent enough....
Die in a fire normies! Jk. Why is there no vanilla tag in thi site?
